title: U.S. Women's Open Purse Nearly Doubles to $10M
itunes:title: U.S. Women's Open Purse Nearly Doubles to $10M
description:
It's a blockbuster deal in the world of golf...The USGA and ProMedica have announced a long-term partnership that includes presenting partner rights for the U.S. Women's Open, which means more eyeballs on the sport, and bigger checks for the athletes involved. Hosts Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch discuss with U.S. Golf Association CEO Mike Whan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
